trigger.name: has just been restarted
trigger.description: 4294966936 is 2^31-2*180 if checking frequency changes this number must be updates the second condition was added to avoid false triggering when Timeticks value overflows

item_prototype.name: Temperature Sensor {#SNMPDESCR} Alert UP Value
item_prototype.description:
Value is multiplied by 0.75 in order to simplify trigger creation. Using original value - more function calls of device already dead, see description below.
The highest value that the associated instance of the object ciscoEnvMonTemperatureStatusValue may obtain before an emergency shutdown of the managed device is initiated

item.name: Buffer create failures due to no free memory

trigger.name: has just been restarted
trigger.description: (4294967296*0.01)-2*180=42949313 if checking frequency changes this number must be updates the second condition was added to avoid false triggering when Timeticks value overflows
